reviewText: Good skating video. Good DVD for any huge bam fan. They are some commercials in between each sesh but they show you other skating DVDs. If you're a real skateboarding fan you won't mind the commercials. Just showing you other great skating videos which is still a win
This dvd is not worth it's retail value. It is almost like watching an episode of skateboarding right from tv because there are commercials right in the middle of the feature. Not worth the money.

Bam totally rocked this video.  But the dude rocks in everything he's in.  I really dig his house and I think he's one of the greatest skaters around.  He's an easy-going, beer-guzzling dude and he's super nice.  The video was awesome and I can't wait to see more of Bam in the future!!!  Keep rockin' Bam!
